text: I love irony  its like a fun twist on Hypocrisy I ve always had urges  I ve always fought them off  I ve always been the golden boy of mental health recovery stories that people use  it s ironic that I ve helped a lot of people convince them not to commit suicide and here I am  irony is a really beautiful thing  it s like a fun twist on hypocrisy in a way  even though I ve tried my best to help people I won t fucking forget those who I wasn t able to help  their existence always haunts me so I keep doing it I keep helping  not because they haunt me but because I hate that I m selfless  and I hate how much I fucking do for people and how many times people have abused that part about me  it just hurts it hurts a lot whenever I think about it and its all the time I always do my best for people im always there for people  but whenever I need help where is everyone they just vanish  Ive always had suicidal urges and urges where I wanna go back to the way that I was that being similar to living under a rock with no connection whatsoever or human connection   im not sure where ill be after posting this but its becoming slowly larger and larger and its becoming so much harder and harder to fight ive fought for far too long  ive never had a childhood since my brain decided to block it out due to trauma and i just had to grow up early people should appreciate what they have a lot more often really it s like we re missing  an emotional common sense  I take care of others yet I can t take care of myself for fucking shit and I m just sitting here on the edge thinking how would my head splat if its gonna be slow or fast  painless or painful  I think I would prefer slow and painless  I ve managed to come to terms with the concept of death but not the concept of just not existing  doesn t matter anymore I probably won t be here
summary: I love irony. I have always had urges and I've always fought them off. I always do my best for people but whenever I need help everyone disappears. I want to go back to the way I was. I've never had a childhood since my brain blocked it out due to trauma.
cleaned: love irony urge fight good people need help disappear want way childhood brain block trauma

text: I m thinking of dying because I feel like a burdenHi  I wanted to get this off my chest I am   I wasn t suicidal some months ago  I was just depressed  But after trying different medications  some completely disturbed my mind  They made me more depressed and anxious  I keep thinking that no one cares about me  If I don t look okay  they just avoid me  My parents are depressed because of me  Most of my friends don t talk to me anymore  I m a burden for everyone  Even society   I cannot focus on my study  so I fail  I don t know what I want to be later  so I ll probably keep changing my studies  which is not nice for my parents who pay my studies  I probably won t be a useful member of society since I can t be productive  I stopped liking everything that used to be a part of me   working out  hiking  playing the violin  drawing  I m doing nothing all day  I just binge watch Netflix to avoid my own thoughts  I m boring now  That s not nice for my friends not my boyfriend   That s why I think about dying  I feel like I d relieve everyone  I don t want to die  But I feel like it would be the right thing to do  I m really sad that it is the way I think  And sometimes I wish something would happen that would make me die  so I wouldn t have to do it myself  I don t cry when I think of that  I m just trying to see the pros and cons  I know that it would hurt my family  But I feel like they d be better in the long run  once they grieved I wish I could go back to who I was some years ago  I used to be fun  good at school and good at art  Now I m just bad at everything  because I don t do anything  and my brain just seems slower  I want to do so many things but I m unable to do them  I don t like anything  Im just empty and sad   Thank you for reading  I d appreciate any advices on how to feel better from people who experienced the same thing
summary: After trying different medications some disturbed her mind and made her more depressed, she thinks about suicide. Her parents are depressed because of her, her friends don't talk to her anymore, she can't focus on her studies, she doesn't like to do anything and her brain seems slower.
cleaned: try different medication disturb mind depressed think suicide parent depressed friend not talk anymore not focus study not like brain slow

text: Why shouldn t I I ve been alone for over   years  never kissed anyone  only thing I ve done was hold hands    years ago  My friends don t text me  I have to message them first and when they reply  if at all  it s nothing  no connection no emotion  I cant drive  fail my test for learners and to scared of failure to retry  I work at a shitty job making shitty money  over worked under appreciated  The girl I m trying to see won t even text me anymore  No life experience  barely passed high school  If I quit my job then I ll be back in my parent s house    years of trying to improve to be back at square one  If I do it there then my mom will find me and that s the worst thing she could find  I m miserable and I cant change it  I want to write a book but I ve procrastinated so hard in life I cant bother to make food   of the time and somehow still fat  My hobby is so looked down on  my parents laugh at me  and I m so invested in it I cant but money anywhere else   The only thing I have goin for me are my   cats  I don t treat them as well as i should  I m a terrible cat dad My  th birthday is coming next week  Life is hopeless for me  no goal  no achievement  no love  nothing  So why shouldn t I
summary: There is nothing good in life for him. He has been alone for over years, he's never kissed anyone, he can't drive, he has no life experience, he barely passed high school, he works at a bad job, his friends don't text him anymore, he doesn't treat his cats well and he's fat.
cleaned: good life year kiss not drive no life experience barely pass high school work bad job friend not text anymore not treat cat fat

text: stuck with the mind and body I was born into  realizing the limitations of my immutable flaws  I don t want to live my lifeI saw a clip from the perspective of some guy   some American tourist   live streaming from japan where he was speaking English to some stranger  clearly not being understood  and this woman was still basically throwing herself at him my mind has been particularly bad this week  I can count a few times where I had to fight back tears at work   apropos of no immediate problem   just dissatisfaction with my life  and dwelling on it  I ll never be that guy  I ll never be that attractive or that outwardly confident  I m   severely balding at   unable to put any muscle on my arms  despite weight training every other day for the past   years and consuming a shit load of protein powder  and with an extremely mediocre face  I ve consulted a cosmetic surgeon about the balding and was turned away because I m literally losing too much hair I thought that I could compensate for my physical shortcomings by just having a really successful career and making money   that s the conventional wisdom anyway  So I studied a ton and got a good job  A week ago my salary got raised into the six figure range  None of it has made a difference  Since getting hired and becoming  successful  nothing has changed  I just have more money and nothing to do with it I know it s dumb to get hung up on a   second video for which I have almost no context   but it so perfectly crystallized all the shit I ve been feeling for a long time  There are people who are just hot  It s just easy for them to meet and date the kinds of people they want  I m not  I won t be  regardless of how much effort I put in  And I don t want to live the life implied by that fact  I don t want to be alone  And I don t want to settle  And I don t want to keep putting in effort without any kind of hope or validation that it s not being completely wasted  It s become painful  The things I used to like now just make me sick  I just want to die
summary: A video of a man live streaming from Japan made him realize that he will never be the guy he wants to be. He is dissatisfied with his physical shortcomings and his lack of success in his career. He doesn't want to live the life implied by that fact.
cleaned: video man live streaming japan realize guy want dissatisfied physical shortcoming lack success career not want live life imply fact

text: Life now seems like too much shit for so little reward Lifes getting the better of me  Lately all I have been thinking about is a way out  I m not going to lie  my life up until the last few years has been pretty good   Im   now Now life just doesnt appeal to me at all  You are expected to go to work  settle down and start a family  repeat the same shit day in day out until you finally retire when it s too late to do anything and then you die I ve enjoyed my teen years and early  s but all my friends are settled down with girlfriends and good jobs  Im alone most of the time  I don t have confidence to go out and do stuff alone and have bad anxiety  It feels like i m being forced into finding a girl to settle down with but I can t do that   Because I don t want to and   I wouldn t be able to hold down a relationship with all my problems anyway  I do have a part time job but still live with my parents which is deemed as really sad by some people  I very rarely go out and in my free time I do nothing  absolutely nothing  I just don t like the system society expects everyone to fit into  I feel like an outcast Bottom line of it is I just dunno where to turn and taking the easy way out seems like a good idea to me right now  Although I know at the moment I probably don t have the balls for suicide  I m sorry if this seems like a rant post  it s not  Im so fed up with life I need somewhere to vent before i change my mind
summary: Lifes getting the better of me and I'm thinking about suicide. Life is too much shit for so little reward. I don't have confidence to go out and do stuff alone and I have bad anxiety. I have a part time job but live with my parents. I feel like an outcast.
cleaned: life get well think suicide life shit little reward not confidence stuff bad anxiety time job live parent feel like outcast
